## üí¨ Community Support

### GitHub Discussions

Join the conversation with other Alex users:

- **[Q&A](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/discussions/categories/q-a)** - Ask questions and get help

[Start a Discussion ‚Üí](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/discussions/new)

### Issue Tracker

Found a bug? Have a feature request?

- **[Report a Bug](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)** - Submit detailed bug reports
- **[Request a Feature](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)** - Propose new functionality
- **[Documentation Issue](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/issues/new?template=documentation.md)** - Report docs problems

[View All Issues ‚Üí](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/issues)

## üîí Security Issues

**Do NOT report security vulnerabilities in public issues!**

Please use [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/security/advisories/new) to privately report security vulnerabilities.

See our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) for details on our response process.

## ü§ù Contributing

Want to contribute? We welcome pull requests!

See our [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for:

- Code standards and conventions
- Development setup instructions
- Pull request guidelines
- Code of Conduct

## üìß Direct Contact

For questions not suitable for public discussion:

- **General Inquiries**: Open a GitHub Discussion
- **Private Matters**: Use the repository owner's GitHub profile contact options
- **Security Issues**: Use [Security Advisories](https://github.com/fabioc-aloha/Alex_Plug_In/security/advisories/new)

## ‚ö° Quick Help

### Common Issues

| Issue                        | Solution                            |
| ---------------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| Extension not loading        | Check VS Code version >= 1.109      |
| Commands not working         | Run `Alex: Initialize Architecture` |
| Synapse errors               | Run `@alex /dream` to repair        |
| Chat participant not showing | Ensure GitHub Copilot is active     |

### Useful Commands

| Command                         | What It Does               |
| ------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `@alex /status`                 | Check architecture health  |
| `@alex /dream`                  | Run neural maintenance     |
| `@alex /selfactualize`          | Comprehensive health check |
| `Alex: Initialize Architecture` | Deploy/reset architecture  |
